‘Gay blood ban’ to be removed next year, New Zealand Blood Service says https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gay-blood-ban-to-be-be-be-be-be-next-new-new--zealand-blood-service-says/bdffyxykajg3lnqbtjmdgoeeyrq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gay-blood-ban-to-be-be-be-be-be-next-new-new--zealand-blood-service-says/bdffyxykajg3lnqbtjmdgoeeyrq/ Isaac DavisonThe blanket ban on donations by gay and bisexual men is being scrapped. Wed, 29 Jan 2025 22:00:00 +0000 Three times as many gay and bisexual men would donate blood if the rules were aligned with similar countries, a study published last year found.
